hadiths.text: Mu’adh bin Jabal narrated that he heard the Prophet (ﷺ) say:“Any Muslim who fights in the cause of Allah for the time between two milkings of a she-camel, he will be guaranteed Paradise.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِتَالِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وَتَعَالَى
chapter.eng-name: Fighting in the cause of Allah
